entity.name: content
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('people-',people.id) AS identifier, people.id, surname, forename, fullname, people.county, people.countyID, email, people.postcode, CONCAT(people.address,' ',people.town_city,' ',people.county) AS place, CONCAT(people.lat,',',people.lon) AS coordinates, people.lat AS lat, people.lon AS lon, primaryactivities.term AS activity, people.created, people.updated, people.woeid, organisations.name AS organisation FROM people LEFT JOIN primaryactivities ON people.primary_activity = primaryactivities.id LEFT JOIN organisations ON people.organisationID = organisations.secuid
